text.text: Average number of new patients seen by a facility in one day

label.text: Special Opening Dates: Collection of dates on which a facility

text.text: is open (can be used for irregularly opening facilities)

label.text: Opening Frequency: Period of time that passes between the regular

text.text: opening of a facility (can be used for mobile, regularly opening facilities)
